root: ^Saoirse: Oisin, Cedric's bravery has led to his capture.
^Saoirse: Cedric knew the risks, yet he acted selflessly.

c-0: ^ Oisin: I'm grateful we have a such kind companion.

b: ^ Saoirse: And his heart was honest.
^ Saoirse: He used his wisdom to get the number of unlocking the chest.
^ Saoirse: He was a young man with great manner.
^ Saoirse: Though he uses magic with an unrestrained spirit.
